original_title: Sesame Street: The Best of Elmo 4
overview: Who’s furry and friendly and red all over? It’s Elmo! Everyone’s favorite little red monster is back for the fourth installment of his best moments from Sesame Street. With great stories, songs, and silliness, this collection is sure to thrill Elmo’s biggest (and littlest) fans.
title: Sesame Street: The Best of Elmo 4
